quoteDoc: Terms of Service and End User License Agreement
quoteText:
We may change the Terms or modify, suspend, or terminate any features of the Services at any time in our sole discretion consistent with applicable law.
We will notify you (including by posting the updated Terms on the Services) of changes to these Terms.
title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
